attributes.action: all government workers i.e mp,s, prime minister get payed minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
all government workers i.e, mp's, prime-minister  get payed minimum wage with no bonus just traveling expenses
any one found to be a member of a secret society ie stonemasons, Illuminati ,skull and bones, to be  expelled from office with no pension  and never allowed to work in the government ever again
